column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My friend and I met up yesterday for lunch at Cafe BaBaReeba.  Who knew they had brunch?  Apparantly not many people
column2: because the place was empty.  We sat on the heated patio
column3: and were the ONLY people out there.  At noon.  On a Sunday.  (I laughed at the people waiting outside Nookies in the cold).
